attributes.review: I opened this app and logged in and I almost yeeted my phone the sight was horrible I saw trump naked getting spray tanned it was gross I showed my sister and her eye balls melted get rid of this app NOW or other peoples eye balls will melt my sister had to go to the ER🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: NO JUST NO

attributes.review: My mom got stolen by this app!! She was cooking dinner and a trump ufo just picked her up and left. My dinosaur chicken nuggets are now burnt 😭😭. If I could give them less than a 1 star rating I would. ( rip dinosaur chicken nuggies) 😢
attributes.title: This app will steal your mom!!!

attributes.review: i never thought i’d have to say this, but here it is. when i opened the app, my dogs started flying! this app is some sort of evil magic. i tried to look through the app, but the further i went, the more bad things happened!!! my tv exploded, my microwave grew legs etc!!!! it’s insane! take this off the app store before someone gets hurt. 👺🤬
attributes.title: life changing, in a bad way

attributes.review: this app was absolutely horrendous. it first asked me for my phone number and i felt my privacy was violated (as trump does so well) 100% would not recommend downloading AND voting for him
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I opened the app and saw an orange 🍊 Cheeto puff with a micro croissant 🥐 on the front page and immediately vomited 🤮 all over the floor. this app is the equivalent to COVID-19 🦠 and should be isolated 😷 from the rest of the App Store ASAP!!
attributes.title: ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimeshappy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆
